February 20, 1961
Hr. William 0Â« Harley, President
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
Suite 1119
DuPont Circle Office Building
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bills
1. X accept appointment to the Awards and
Citation Committee.
2, X accept appointment as chairman of
the Publications Committee, although X question
your wisdom.
3* I accept the recommended committee
members, and terns indicated. Do I write the
committee members, advising them of appointment ?
On Wisconsin.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
Director, University
Broadcasting
FESfb
ccs Hill/mcKenzie
